de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin
Class DicomStorageSCUPlugin

java.lang.Object
  de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin.DicomRouterPlugin
      de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin.DicomStorageSCUPlugin

public class DicomStorageSCUPlugin
extends DicomRouterPlugin

This class extends the DicomRouterPlugin class and implements DicomRouterPlugin interface. It take the rolle of a DICOM Storage Service Class User and sends Dicom Object to a DICOM Storage Service Class Provider.

2005.08.20 hacklaender: Changed the processing of properties.
2004.01.31 hacklaender: Logging messages modified: No stack trace.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

cfg

de.iftm.dcm4che.services.ConfigProperties cfg
The configuration properties of the StorageService working class.

protocol

private java.lang.String protocol
The transmission protocol to use.

Normally the 'dicom' protocol is used. The data are send unencrypted. If you would like to use the encrypted transmission, use the 'dicom-tls' protocol. If you use it, you have to define some other properties, named 'tls_xxx'.

dicom-tls: accept TLS connection (offer AES and DES encryption)

dicom-tls.aes : accept TLS connection (force AES or DES encryption)

dicom-tls.3des: accept TLS connection (force DES encryption)

dicom-tls.nodes : accept TLS connection (no encryption)

called_aets

private java.lang.String called_aets
Own AET (Application Entity Title). Default is "", that means association of any AET is accepted. The provided property value should be a comma or space separated list of individual AETs. Providing no value is equivalent to to a value "".

calling_aets

private java.lang.String calling_aets
AETs (Application Entity Titles) of the storage service users. Default is "", that means association of any AET is accepted. The provided property value should be a comma or space separated list of individual AETs. Providing no value is equivalent to to a value "".

host

private java.lang.String host
The IP address of the computer the Dataset should be stored. 127.0.0.1 corresponds to "localhost".

port

private java.lang.String port
Holds the port number of the server [default=104].
